title: Royal Enfield sales rise 13 pc to 80,251 units in November
description: Royal Enfield records 13% rise in November wholesales, reaching 80,251 units. Domestic sales surge by 14%, totaling 75,137 units, while exports witness a 2% increase, reaching 5,114 units. CEO B Govindarajan expresses confidence in sustaining growth with recent launches.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
